name: Yehoram Gaon
description:
'''Yehoram Gaon''' ({{langx|he|יהורם גאון}}; born December 28, 1939) is an Israeli singer, actor, director, comedian, producer, TV and radio host, and public figure.  He has also written and edited books on Israeli culture.

The son of [[Sephardic Jews|Sephardic Jewish]] parents—a [[History of the Jews in Bosnia and Herzegovina|Bosnian]] father and [[History of the Jews in Turkey|Turkish]] mother, both immigrants to Israel—he became an early inspiration of "solidarity and pride" for the Sephardic community.
